The claim made by President Trump that: 96 percent of results on ‘Trump News’ are from National Left-Wing Media" was analyzed and verified by experts.
The expert: s verdict indicates that the claim originated from a post on PJ Media, a conservative site, and was later picked up by President Trump.
To verify the claim: Paula Bolyard, the supervising editor at PJ Media, performed a Google search using the "News" tab and analyzed the results using a media bias chart.
The analysis revealed that out of 76 tot: most came from left-leaning outlets such as CNN, the Washington Post, and NBC, while only three came from the right-leaning Wall Street Journal. Although the study was not scientific, it suggested a pattern of bias against right-leaning content.
